verbs.description: sinterklaas cookies after [V: opening] [ARG1: our gifts] [ARGM-TMP: on christmas eve] [ARGM-ADV: as children] we would make these cookies for santa claus to snack on with his glass of milk the crisp spice cookies are delicious dipped in that milk — or in your coffee on christmas morning —charli fontana pella iowa

sinterklaas cookies after opening our gifts on christmas eve as children we [V: would] make these cookies for santa claus to snack on with his glass of milk the crisp spice cookies are delicious dipped in that milk — or in your coffee on christmas morning —charli fontana pella iowa
